title: SDE-1
description: orked as a Full Stack Developer, contributing to multiple projects across frontend, backend, and client-facing roles. I developed the complete Admin Panel for Sydkik, implementing user management, subscription tracking, escalation handling with real-time notifications, event logs, and customer support integration with HelpScout. For Klaviss, a US-based real estate platform, I optimized property listing flows, integrated LLMs such as Gemini and OpenAI for automated PDF data extraction, created custom prompts, and resolved critical issues to enhance performance and user experience. Additionally, I led the frontend development of GenHR, an internal HRMS tool, using React.js and Tailwind CSS, while implementing Firebase Authentication, building secure RESTful APIs with Node.js, leveraging Redis for performance optimization, and applying JWT-based role access control. Throughout these projects, I focused on building scalable, reusable solutions while adhering to Agile methodologies to ensure timely and efficient delivery.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Worked across multiple projects during my time as a Full Stack Developer. Developed the frontend for Wild Wheat Bakery’s website and contributed to several modules of IRCTC Tejas-NfTtrace, including a feedback system to enhance user engagement. On the NFTtrace mobile app, I built the Support and Offer modules for both frontend and backend, and integrated Firebase into the Sutr project for real-time sync and authentication. Also, resolved critical bugs in the Obortech project and optimized Chaincode’s website for better performance and interaction.
